News.Title: Nephro Care India Inaugurates Advanced Cardiothoracic and Vascular Surgery Unit
News.Summary: Nephro Care India, a company with a market capitalization of 267 crore rupees, has announced the inauguration of an advanced cardiothoracic and vascular surgery unit through one of its subsidiaries. This new facility aims to provide comprehensive cardiac and vascular care services to patients.

News.Title: Nephro Care India Introduces AI-Powered Ultrasound System
News.Summary: Nephro Care India has inaugurated a state-of-the-art, voice-controlled, AI-powered ultrasound system. This advanced technology is designed to enhance diagnostic accuracy and enable more precise medical procedures. The implementation of this system represents a significant technological upgrade in the company's healthcare services.
